attributes.action: make dangerous clamshell plastic packaging illegal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'm sick to death of cutting myself on the hard, sealed clear-plastic "clam-shell" packaging for electronic goods. I find the packaging nigh-on impossible to open without resorting to scissors, which unsurprisingly I don't always have with me. When it is opened, it is razor sharp and many serious hand injuries like tendon cuts have occured. 

There are alternative anti-theft measures that can be used, and that are less harmful, and less frustrating.

I implore the people of this country to beg of the Prime Minister to fix this horrid wrong.
